sentences.sentence: Child abuse is a publishable offence in our country.
sentences.translation: 在我们国家，虐待儿童是犯罪行为应该受到惩罚。

sentences.sentence: So even though that work was anecdotal and not blinded and not publishable, it was very convincing.
sentences.translation: 所以那个研究尽管是纯叙述性的，非盲测的，而且无法出版，却非常具有说服力。

sentences.sentence: You’re not going to have any chanceof writing a publishable novel if you ditch it three chapters in.
sentences.translation: 如果你写了三章就放弃写作，那你不会有发表小说的机会。
